titles.title: For the relief of Oscar Salas-Velazquez.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/17/1995--Introduced. Prohibits the Attorney General from disapproving a named individual's petition for classification as an immediate relative, or application for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence, on the grounds that his marriage to a named individual was entered into in order to evade U.S. immigration laws.
